page.title: 10THE VICAR'S TYPICAL DAY
page.content: The Vicar of Walesby is also the Vicar of Egmanton and Rector of Kirton. Although no day is the same as another these are a few activities that he may engage in. He will rise at 6:45 and be in Egmanton church at 7:30 for a mass at 8:00. He says daily offers at Walesby church at 9:00 and mass at 10:00. After this he may take the sick communion set around to the ill in their homes. After lunch he may have a number of things to do, such as visiting people, or on Thursday afternoons he will take assembly at Walesby school. At 6:00 he will go to church to say prayers and on some evenings he will have a meeting, his day then ending between 9:00 and 10:00.
